website_summaries.verdict: Offers 2,000-pound. capacity for under $70, which is a great deal for short-term or smaller projects.
pros: Great value for a quality piece of equipment
The included mounting channel makes it a great option for mounting on your ATV for added power
Includes a roller fairlead and remote
cons: Some users have had to replace the included cable for one of higher quality

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this or any products from champion power equipment. They will not support it. I feel bad for the ppl trying to sell this junk. the motor didn't work outa the box, i called in the support like like it says to. Did exactly what they told me to confirm it was all together, which it was, and they just wanted to argue with me. STAY AWAY FROM CHAMPION POWER EQUIPMENT!
customer_reviews.author: MAGA2020

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I didnt need it to pull my wheeler ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is cheap. Used it 1 time for a winch on my 4 wheeler plow. Couldnt even finish my driveway. The cheap cable broke 2 times and the winch had some cheap metal gear blow apart. Good thing I didnt need it to pull my wheeler out because it never would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: JASON BALOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: The switch didn't work from the beginning now they want ...
customer_reviews.text: The switch didn't work from the beginning now they want me to buy a new switch and it's less than a month old I don't understand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes a lot of noise as grinds along, but it works
customer_reviews.text: I use it to wench a small plane (650 lb) up a slight grade into my hanger. It makes a lot of noise as grinds along, but it works. I would wonder about 2000 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used for a plow on a 2016 Polaris Sportsman 450 HO with the KFI mount.
customer_reviews.author: stickbowcoop

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for how I use it.
customer_reviews.text: I put this 2000 pound rated winch in my work van, I use my van to haul Atv's/ quads / 4wheelers.. to my repair shop. Before I was pushing them up into the van by myself and suffered an injury. I'm getting old so I can't do that anymore. Now I set the quad in front of my ramps, hook up the cable, push the button and it pulls the 400+ lb quad into the van, no stress no injuries no problem. I am very happy. I had to lengthen the wires & add a large motorcycle battery to work for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: jose quervo

customer_reviews.title: pay attention to mounting direction
customer_reviews.text: My fault, but this can only be mounted as it is pictured with roller fairing adapter that came with it. I already had a mounting plate on my ATV which if i used the bracket that came with the winch would have put the roller fairings facing down towards my radiator. I fabricated some quick L brackets and mounted the roller fairing to the frame and put the winch on the bracket. Wiring was very straight forward red to positive, black to negative. There was no need for any additional wiring or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Does NOT have 2,000lbs of pull power
customer_reviews.text: Used on a Polaris Sportsman 600 Twin. Factory dry weight is 720lbs for the ATV. Got stuck in some mud only about a foot deep and figured I’d try the winch out. Couldn’t even budge the quad. Used 4x4 and did it myself. Then tried to use it on loading ramps into the back of a truck. Starts to pull it up the ramps and then stops as if the load is too heavy and can’t pull anymore. There’s no way this is a 2,000lb winch if it can’t even pull 720lbs in neutral up a set of loading ramps. No info on how to contact seller for help either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New ATV Winch
customer_reviews.text: So far the winch installed very easy. Looks like it will do a great job. My only complains are the hooks doesn't have a wide enough opening. its about a 3/8, 3/4 would be better, but its easy enough to change. I also prefer the nylon cables to the metal cables that come with it. I'm sure it will be good for the quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: works fine.  But the full amperage switch is cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with it. However the large switch is full amperage, takes a lot of space and the contacts are difficult to press. These full amperage switches tend to fail under heavy use, like using a snowplow on an ATV. Probably when this fails, I'll switch to a relay and a more user-friendly thumb switch.
customer_reviews.author: Insight in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: worked good for 8 months then motor died
customer_reviews.text: worked good for 8 months then motor died. Champion's customer service was easy to work with and sent me a new replacement motor 5 min after calling them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little winch for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable winch that I can mount on the back of my UTV or my tractor. This one is perfect! I have a winch cradle that fits into my 2" receiver hitch on any vehicle.....then I have put 12v plugins on both vehicles. I got this one specifically for the low price.....but my next one will probably be a 3000 lb or 4500 lb. I have used it two times already to pull my stuck tractor backwards (just heavy duty enough to help me get backward traction!). Thank you for a quick and easy solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to replace another Champion 2000# I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another Champion 2000# I had bought several years ago. The bolt pattern is different and it doesn't seem to be built as stoutly. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: solidly built, with a minor improvement suggested.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the winch to lift multiple cables in an array which supports a table for my grandson's train set up. It works well, and the price is more than reasonable. Two things I recommend for improvement: The leads to the battery should have larger holes to connect to the threaded posts. The wires from the remote control to the battery should be extended another three feet for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. Vecchiet

customer_reviews.title: Cable jams up.
customer_reviews.text: This winch is well made and works well. My complaint is that the cable is so stiff that when you free spool it to pull it out it acts like a spring and 'bird nests' and jams up. Very hard to unwind the cable. I thought it might get better with use, but it has not.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Eby

customer_reviews.title: Used it for pulling logs up a hill. Worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for pulling logs up a hill. Worked ok for about 10 logs then something in the gearing either sheared or is misalgined. Either way, motor runs but spool doesn't turn. Have yet to take the time to pull it apart to see what the deal is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: The winch works great for my application, but I did have to replace the cable a with winch rope from harbor freight. Since the steel cable continued to bird nest on me. But other then that I'm a happy camper with it
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used it mounted with a 12 volt converter to use in the garage. The 12-volt winches have a higher lift capacity than a 110v volt and at a lower price. The button action does, however require a well-placed firm thumb pressure to activate.
customer_reviews.author: RG Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with some damage to carton. Winch was incorrectly installed to motor housing. Disengagement pin doesn't re-engage well. Mount plate and bolt pattern appear weak for the stress of winching.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for atv.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 wheeler for lifting deer (Suzuki eiger 400). It was easy to install hooked it to a pulley mounted in the garage and could easily lift me 215lbs. No more heavy lifting for me. Plus it can drag my 4 wheeler up hills with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Raeannah Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great price - superior product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my golf car- i’ll Never get it stuck again!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this on my shop ceiling to hoist my Jeep Wrangler hardtop on and off easier. I have 15ft ceilings so I do have to extend the wiring. Other than that, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: SlOW pulling
customer_reviews.text: Slow pos, but it'll pull what it says... but dont expect the speed to be any better no matter if its light or heavy... speed doesnt change at all .... i tried
customer_reviews.author: thiago

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: used it only three months and died plowing only one yard wouldn't recommend anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.author: duffy

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Remote did not work, cable is inferior, rusted within months.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I want and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I want and great value. Only problem is the control switch, it is hard to use - buttons require a LOT of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: chuckstr8934

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk right out of the box didn’t even work had completely installed and had to return if I could give it no stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Josh Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The winch works good But the remote pendent wires smoked and started on fire.
customer_reviews.text: I used this the last snow we had here in Northeast Wisconsin. And the wires from the remote pendant melted and started on fire. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: CurtO

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: when I cut the rubber band holding the cable, it went spinning. Too much memory I guess. The remote is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: easy hookup
customer_reviews.text: Served it's purpose, made up a lift on my trailer to lift and set shore station in the lake, operate wench from lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: MISSING BOLT,NUT, AND WASHER TO HANDLE BAR CLAMP FOR SWITCH...NO BIG DEAL BUT THE SWITCH ITSELF IS VERY POORLY MADE. HAVE TO PUSH THEM IN HARD SEVERAL TIMES BEFORE THEY MAKE CONTACT! ALL PARTS INCLUDING CABLE ARE POOR CHEAP QUALITY. INSTALLED THIS ON MY FOUR WHEELER FOR PLOWING...WILL SEE HOW LONG IT LAST??
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good buy..
customer_reviews.text: Works well but is a little noisey. Rollers on the front should be bigger so the cable doesn't rub on the bracket fraying the cable.

customer_reviews.title: Basic Cheap Winch
customer_reviews.text: Little to no instructions with this kit. Cable seems thin. Remote is large, awkward and cheap feeling. I will update if this winch makes it through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Froggerak

customer_reviews.title: that it really needs the better one we had to purchase - really
customer_reviews.text: Switch broke right away. Had to order replacement switch from Champion; they said the switch on the unit we bought was the cheap one, that it really needs the better one we had to purchase - really? Doesn't seem right to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good quality!,💖
customer_reviews.text: Great, tools, easy to install, great price, quality good, very happy husband, highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: life is easier with a wench
customer_reviews.text: life is easier with a wench, but she won't move materials around the yard. this little winch will. small enough to be used on all kinds of equipment without throwing out your back. I should have gotten one sooner.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t hold up worth it to spend more on really good winch pay the extra hundred to get better quality

customer_reviews.title: It does not have a plug? There is no way to plug in this winch.. i wanted to use it in the house
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with a plug, nor does it show it in the pictures.. I cannot use this tool in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nick. DeNora

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Use it on back of riding lawnmower to lift and drop leaf catch basket on leave sweeper .. Works great.... beats a rope and your arm to dump heavy basket full of leafs and acorns

customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s perfect for the small stuff I need it for!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice winch
customer_reviews.text: Came fairly fast, boxed great, and works like a charm. would recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This winch was very affordable but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter C. Petrucci

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my 2017 Polaris Ranger 900. I had to rotate the motor to insure no shorting issues but this winch delivered everthing I ask of it power wise. The only issue I had was I had to drill some holes in bulkhead to accommadate shorter leads on the remote switch. Other than that I'm totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: susanne m parks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Handy little winch and powerful. Control is a little hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to install a plate to attach it to my 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.author: C. Foronda

customer_reviews.title: Great power
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Have it connected to a car battery for a mobile winch.

customer_reviews.title: Mounting difficulty high for ATV
customer_reviews.text: Seems to good quality. Mounting takes a little tinkering and buying additional materials to secure. Simple if you had a flat surface to mount but ATV don't. Supplied with long cables but some more tinkering to remove excessive length for better appearance than having rolled up cable.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit will be installing it on a lawn tractor for a plow
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike....NY

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup. Use it as an opener of the lid for my outdoor tv. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Winch works great.
customer_reviews.text: The winch works great although I had the cut off some of the end of the cable because it began to untwist after the first use.

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT 6 gauge wire.
customer_reviews.text: had to extend battery wire. we bought real 6 gauge and they dont fit. the yellow connector they have on there is for another size.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced it with a better winch and gave this one to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Weak. Not well made. Control switch did not work so they sent me a replacement. Replaced it with a better winch and gave this one to a friend.

customer_reviews.title: nice winch for a small ATV
customer_reviews.text: nice winch for a small ATV. I added it to raise/lower my plow blade. Nice complete install kit comes with it. Sure beats using the mechanical lift handle...

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it on my sportsman 500 and worked ok at first but once weather got cold it got really slow until it didn't work at all. Not very impressed when I need it in the snow more than anything.

customer_reviews.title: In/out control buttons not good.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a very good little winch but the in/out control buttons are almost impossible to use when wearing gloves. Since I use this winch to control a snowblower chute, that is a big problem. Otherwise, it would rate 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Champion winch - Gets it done!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with how quickly I received this winch and the packaging. I've yet to install it, but the packaging and included accessories point to good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product.
customer_reviews.text: This has saved a lot of sore muscles by pulling equipment out of tight spots.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, well worth the small investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this winch to use a power lift for my tent trailer. The tent top weighs about 500 lbs and the while the hand winch raised the top just fine, my custom trailer project needed something a little snazzier (and easier). The winch works great, lifts the top almost effortlessly..... but it is a little noisy. So far I'm perfectly satisfied, but only time will really tell. Even if it lasts only a few years, at this price, I still got my $$$ worth.

customer_reviews.title: Champion Power Equipment 12003 2000 lb
customer_reviews.text: Hard for me to use. Up and down buttons require too much pressure. I have to use both thumbs to get cable to move so I don't have a hand to guide lift. Earlier model I had could be operated with one thumb.

customer_reviews.title: Want to return this product but missed the short return ...
customer_reviews.text: Want to return this product but missed the short return window. Product does not fit on anything unless you spend another equal amount of money that this cost for additional mounts and extended wires. Unspooled the wire to find that is very rusty which means it will have a much shorter life and will not withstand the pressures of pulling for which it claims. Haven't tried to use it because it does not mount to anything, which means it does not work!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Device worked great for 1st couple lifts
customer_reviews.text: I used the winch for a vertical lift, about 1,000 lbs. Device worked great for 1st couple lifts. However, I think problem may be operator didn't know can't start lift when under load. if not under load and then start, lift works good, But if under load, stop and then attempt to start, had problems, and after couple attempts didn't lift at all. Need instructions on use. Still, lot of muscle for good price.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY BUY SUPERWINCH!!!

Switch that comes with this unit is a POS will only work for short period. It's designed for little to no use. Don't waste your money buy a SUPERWINCH FROM THE START. CUSTOMER SERVICE IS A COMPLETE JOKE....

product_meta.title: Champion 2000-lb. ATV/UTV Winch Kit
product_meta.description: The Champion Power Equipment 12003 2000-lb. ATV/UTV Winch Kit includes everything you need to start winching, including a mounting channel, a roller fairlead and a remote control. With a rated line pull of 2000 pounds, mount this winch on your ATV or side by side with the mounting channel to quickly harness the strength of its 1-horsepower (12-volt) DC permanent magnet motor. The 49-foot by 5/32-inch galvanized, super-duty aircraft cable is less prone to fraying, even when used in highly abrasive terrain, such as in rocks, mud, or sand. This incredibly strong cable is guided onto the 1.2 by 2.9-inch drum through the reliable roller fairlead to maximize the life of the cable. The planetary gear system along with the free-spooling clutch and handlebar-mounted remote control offer excellent control while winching. Designed with your safety in mind, this winch features dynamic braking of the winch drum so you’ll have the stopping power you need for each job. With a gear reduction ratio of 153:1, the winch boasts a line speed of 3.3 feet per minute with a full load, and 10.5 feet per minute with no load. Accompanied by the heavy-duty clevis hook and handy strap, this compact and lightweight tool is anything but lightweight when it comes to power. Offering much more than a motor and a spool of rope, the Champion 2000-lb. Winch Kit is a necessary tool for any situation you might encounter. Champion Support and our nationwide network of service centers will back up your purchase with a 2-year limited warranty and FREE lifetime technical support.
feature_bullets: Powerful – 2000-lb. rated line pull powered by a 1-horsepower (12-volt) DC motor
Efficient – Line speed of 3.3 feet per minute with a full load, and 10.5 feet per minute with no load
Convenient – Included mounting channel, remote control and roller fairlead create an easier than ever winching experience
Hassle-Free –The roller fairlead creates a safe and smooth pull with the dependable 49-foot galvanized super-duty aircraft cable which is able to withstand abrasive terrain without fraying
Reliable – Champion Support includes 2-year limited warranty with FREE lifetime technical support from dedicated experts
